GraphArn.description: The ARN of the graph to which the member account will be invited
GraphArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the graph to which the member account will be invited

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:detective:(([a-z]+-)+[0-9]+):[0-9]{12}:graph:[0-9a-f]{32}  
Update requires: Replacement

MemberId.description: The AWS account ID to be invited to join the graph as a member
MemberId.markdownDescription:
The AWS account ID to be invited to join the graph as a member

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: [0-9]{12}  
Update requires: Replacement

MemberEmailAddress.description: The root email address for the account to be invited, for validation. Updating this field has no effect.
MemberEmailAddress.markdownDescription:
The root email address for the account to be invited, for validation. Updating this field has no effect.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: .*@.*  
Update requires: No interruption

DisableEmailNotification.description: When set to true, invitation emails are not sent to the member accounts. Member accounts must still accept the invitation before they are added to the behavior graph. Updating this field has no effect.
DisableEmailNotification.markdownDescription:
When set to true, invitation emails are not sent to the member accounts. Member accounts must still accept the invitation before they are added to the behavior graph. Updating this field has no effect.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

Message.description: A message to be included in the email invitation sent to the invited account. Updating this field has no effect.
Message.markdownDescription:
A message to be included in the email invitation sent to the invited account. Updating this field has no effect.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Update requires: No interruption
